document_data.name: Talaric Daoran
document_data.mainbody: Lord Protector '''Talaric Daoran''' was a member of the royal [[House Daoran]] of [[Phlan]] and the ruler of the city-state during the midâ€“15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|81}}
document_data.Relationships: He was the son of Phlan's first monarch [[Cvaal Daoran|Cvaal]] and the father of [[Anivar Daoran|Anivar]], the last member of the Daoran dynasty.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1456}}, Talaric broke the treaty his father had formed with the [[dark fey]] of the [[Quivering Forest]], by directing loggers to start cutting down its trees.{{Cite adventurers league/Tales Trees Tell|21}} He vanished from [[Valjevo Castle]] the very next day and was never seen again.
